statements: UPDATE harmony SET name='New Name', description='New Description' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE harmony SET description='Updated Description', name='Updated Name' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE harmony SET name='Symphony', description='A musical composition' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE harmony SET description='A blend of sounds', name='Concerto' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE harmony SET description = 'Example Description 1' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE melody SET notes = 'C D E F G' WHERE concept = 'Example Melody';
UPDATE harmony SET description = 'A musical composition that is pleasing to the ear' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE melody SET notes = 'C D E F G A B' WHERE concept = 'Major Scale';
UPDATE harmony SET concept_description = 'A peaceful combination of sounds' WHERE concept_id = 1;
UPDATE melody SET tempo = 120, key_signature = 'C major' WHERE concept_id = 2;
UPDATE harmony SET concept_name = 'Updated Concept A', concept_description = 'New Description' WHERE concept_id = 1;
UPDATE melody SET tempo = 120, key_signature = 'G major' WHERE concept_name = 'Melody C';
UPDATE Harmony SET description='New description' WHERE id=1;
UPDATE Melody SET duration=3.5, note='G' WHERE id=2;
UPDATE Harmony SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Melody SET duration = 3.5, note = 'G' WHERE id = 2;
UPDATE Harmony SET description = 'Updated description' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Melody SET tonality = 'Major' WHERE id = 3;
UPDATE Harmony SET description = 'A musical arrangement combining chords and melodies' WHERE id = 1;
UPDATE Melody SET tonality = 'Major' WHERE note = 'C' AND duration = 2.5;
